pages.text: $(li)The Totem of Undying is a useful tool that that will immediately resurrect you when you die.$(br)$(li)It must be placed in your inventory for this effect to activate.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:illagers/evoker)Evokers$(/l) will drop this item upon death.
$(li)To save space in your inventory, it can be equipped within the Charm slot in the Curios API menu.
